PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-05722009-04-23HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of PETER MENZIES of Calgary, Alberta, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; designate PETER MENZIES for the Alberta/Northwest Territories region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of the Act; and determine that PETER MENZIES shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Alberta/Northwest Territories regional Office; effective June 5, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
